BBVAEMGA.MX.short_name: BBVA BANCOMER GESTION SA FDO BB
BBVAEMGA.MX.long_name: Fondo BBVA Bancomer RV1 SA de CV S.I.R.V. A
BBVAEMGA.MX.summary: To offer investors the option to invest predominantly in the equity markets of emerging countries known as directly in shares listed on the Mexican Stock Exchange (BMV) or SIC or through collective investment schemes such as ETF's (Exchange traded Funds), which aim to replicate a stock index listed on the BMV or the SIC relating to shares listed in those markets, quoted in pesos or dollars.

BLKEM1A.MX.summary: GOLDEM is an investment company that invests predominantly (80% of total assets) in shares belonging to equity markets called emerging countries, either directly, ETFs (Exchange Traded Funds) or through the purchase of securities issued by an or more investment companies or collective investment schemes.

GBMLATMA.MX.long_name: GBM Fondo de Inversiones Latinoamericanas SA de CV S.I.R.V A
GBMLATMA.MX.summary: The Fund invests in shares of Mexico, Brazil, Peru, Colombia, Argentina and Chile, as well as index-linked ETFs of these same countries, with a greater investment in Mexican and Brazilian stocks, given its importance in the region. The main risks faced by the investments made by the Fund are market risk and concentration by the limited universe of stations that can be reversed. Another risk to consider is the exchange rate for the investment made by the Fund in international markets.
GBMLATMA.MX.family: GBM Administradora de Activos SA de CV

GBMPICTA.MX.short_name: GBM Retorno Absoluto SA de CV
GBMPICTA.MX.long_name: GBM Retorno Absoluto SA de CV S.I.R.V. A
GBMPICTA.MX.summary: The Fund will seek to achieve a high return by investing primarily in equity securities listed on the Brazilian International Quotation System (SIC), Brazilian index trackers or derivatives on these two assets, and the pattern of trade between the Mexican Stock Exchange and Brazil stocks, looking to invest in those companies that have an attractive value and growth perspective according to fundamental analysis.
GBMPICTA.MX.family: GBM Administradora de Activos SA de CV

PEMERGEA.MX.long_name: Principal RV SA de CV S.I.R.V. A
PEMERGEA.MX.summary: The PEMERGE is an investment company that invests primarily in shares belonging to equity markets of the countries commonly known as Emerging Economies, and this can be done directly or through mutual funds and other collective investment schemes or foreign (TRAC's or ETF's) that replicate the performance of stock markets and those looking to offer their customers similar to that observed yields investors by the MSCI Emerging markets Index 1 minus the costs inherent to the bottom and the corresponding number.
